page.title: 06A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: On Friday I went to Lincoln with Mum and Dad to have a look at some wardrobes and wallpaper for my bedroom after that we went and looked at the patio sets.We found one we liked as well as two hall rugs. On Saturday I went to the Water Festival and Dad won a coconut.When we got home we had tea and watched television for the rest of the night. On Sunday we had pork chops,new potatoes,sprouts,gravy and mint sauce. Later we went to the christening of my cousin. The vicar was christening three others at the same time. After, we went to my aunty's house for sandwiches, cakes and a drink of sherry. Later we returned home and spent the rest of the evening watching television.
